title: #322: Human Piñatas
description:
Timestamps below! There were some pretty amazing fake sob wars on the season finale of Real Housewives of New York, and Giner lied hilariously on Real Housewives of Melbourne. Find our bonus episodes and social media links at WatchWhatCrappens.com!

Timestamps:
00 Opening and Crappens Mailbag
RHONY 21:35
RHOM 1:35:00

We have partnered with TuneIn to deliver more bonus content! Download the app! For our own premium feed, bonus episodes and extras, visit http://www.patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
